subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ R. A. Dickey is the only practitioner, this season and perhaps in the ones to follow, of an idiosyncratic pitch that has a distinguished but limited lineage.
snippet: The Mets’ R. A. Dickey is the only practitioner, this season and perhaps in the ones to follow, of an idiosyncratic pitch that has a distinguished but limited lineage.
